website_summaries.verdict: A gel-based moisturizer that is great for those with oily or combination skin. Slight green tint helps reduce redness.
pros: Lightweight gel formula hydrates without weighing skin down
Great for protecting skin from the elements and improving damaged skin
Soothes and strengthens with brand's microbiome complex
cons: Not oil-free and may cause breakouts

customer_reviews.title: Mature skin lookin' dewey
customer_reviews.text: I have ruddy skin with rosacea at 51 y.o.. Got a little sample tube of this stuff, fell in love, and ordered a full size. I have stopped wearing foundation with this, and my rosacea is slowly going away. It gives the skin a dewy look, and am getting compliments on my skin for the first time in a while. Going on 52, that's a nice feeling. It's very viscous and putting it on you might think it would just sit there, but it slowly gets absorbed. I think it's a wonderful product and the ingredients are beautiful with nothing harmful or fake in them. Picture taken in full sunlight - no filters, foundation, editing or botox.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Soothes Angry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this over the holidays. It is the most soothing moisturizer I have ever used. As I age, my facial skin gets angry from hormones, ingrown plucking and dryness. My skin is healing and I couldn't be happier. I came back and bought the full size. I also bought the serum. Finally a brand that is worth the money. If you feel like your skin hurts, this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Linden

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the jar.
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected but not a total waste. The pros are that it is thick and emollient and a good healing moisturizer in a travel friendly tube. The cons it does not have the redness correction and skin tone evening effect that I was hoping for and that the other version of this product that is in the glass jar. It is also little greasy when first applied but absorbs well on my dry skin but doesn't last all day. It smells good without being too perfumie or over powering but somewhat medicinal. Probably won't buy it again since I wanted it mainly for the redness correcting aspect.
customer_reviews.author: jamia romero

customer_reviews.title: Solved my skin problems
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It singlehandedly solves my dry flaking facial skin. It is very thick, and kind of sits on your skin until it absorbs but def buying again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Has completely changed the texture of my skin.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive and no matter what I put on it, it ends up looking red and inflamed, even if the product itself isn't irritating. This doesn't do that at all. Great texture, makes my skin glow!
customer_reviews.author: Byzantium21

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: I decide to try this cream when I read the reviews. It works perfect! And I loved it! I even quit using foundation, just a little bit concealer and this wonderful cream, And I think my face is saying "THANKS" because I have received lot of compliments about how is looking my face ! Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Eilin

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.text: This has now become my go to moisturizer. I’ve started using this day and night for about a month, doesn’t feel heavy on my skin. It also has helped with my acne, I can put this on before bed and by morning my acne is dramatically reduced and not as red!! Love love this product
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER! I have acne prone skin & it’s easily irritated. This moisturizer gives enough moisture but doesn’t leave an oily residue. It’s a little expensive but mines literally lasts me about 3 months so it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JAY301

customer_reviews.title: Cicapair Cream is my HG!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the way it calms down and moisturizes my skin. I sometimes just use it as a lotion in the last step of my skincare routine. It also does a great job at calming down my [toddler] daughter's eczema-like skin irritation and removing redness. It's not greasy, and does great under the BB cream I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennipede

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes well nice light scent
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it five if I would, but I can’t - I haven’t had it long enough. It It has a very light clean scent and goes on very smooth, my skin feels so good right after. Looking forward to see the long term effects.
customer_reviews.author: MVMitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.  Healing.  Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: good for dry, oily, or combo sensitive skin. Non-greasy when it soaks in. Can layer under other products. Have been buying for years. Also good for rosacea,, eczema, psoriasis. (family members use successfully.) Try before Cortisone cream or expensive prescription creams, or it may cut need to use so often. Good for sunburn. My experiences, anyway!.
customer_reviews.author: naturaldog

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL DEAL
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is the “real” tiger grass cream that you buy at Sephora! I bought this, used it, noticed it smelled weird, and had bad skin the entire time I was using. Then ordered directly from Sephora, and the “real” product cleared my skin in a few days! I’ve been using this product for a year and I know now Forsure this one is not the real deal. Order on Sephora’s website!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I have red cheeks and chin. This product did not help alleviate the redness at all. I cannot return it so now I'm stuck with an almost full tube of useless product. I also noticed that I paid approximately $46 for 50ml and you can get it for half that!
customer_reviews.author: K-Reads

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My skin get clear and even when I use this ... This has become a staple in my routine
customer_reviews.author: helen juarez

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: Not too expensive, and it does a great job keeping moisture locked in!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Frank

customer_reviews.title: great for eczema!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was suffering with eczema for almost 4 months and we had tried everything. Then we went to Sephora and the sales lady recommended this to us, so we bought it, and her eczema went away in just a few days!
customer_reviews.author: human

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Emollient cream goes on easily, softens my skin as well as evens out my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: SHopMom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Helped my dermatitis, now I can't live without this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stuff, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer. My skin is very dry, and a friend gave me some as a gift, so I tried it and got addicted. It keeps your skin feeling moist and protected, while also soaking in deeply. I don't know if I'd use this if I had oily skin, as it is very emolient, but for dry skin like mine, it's perfect. My only complaint is that it is really pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! It’s Super thick so a little goes a long ways and it’s super moisturizing. It Clears up all the redness on my face and even my acne scars and it doesn’t make me break out or anything and I have really have sensitive skin. I sometimes wear it under my makeup and Before bed.
customer_reviews.author: DaLaw

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Regular use and my complexion has dramatically changed for the better. No more red face, saggy eyes, and large pours. New customer for life here.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Covers most large pores
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer that adapts to your skin color and feels good on skin
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I already love this product, but this is the first time I’ve received this packaging type. It came with a key to help get the last little bit out, which was a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Vandewalle

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious
customer_reviews.text: Tiger grass, what a lovely concept. This is a little green for color correcting, and the packaging is enticing. It only takes a little to cover the whole face
customer_reviews.author: sinda

customer_reviews.title: Rosacea?  What rosacea?
customer_reviews.text: Rosacea? What rosacea? I saw this on TikTok and decided to try. Glad I did. Warm the cream in your fingers and press it into your face. POOF! Beautiful veil that is lightweight, soft, and perfect. I don’t even wear foundation now. I wish I knew about this product 25 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for anyone with redness and sensitive skin. I have seen a complete 180 in my skin tone and receive compliments almost daily that I am glowing. I have now purchased several additional Dr. Jart products and recommended this brand to numerous friends/family/colleagues. Product is surprisingly light in texture and a little goes a long way. I will be adding this to my skin routine indefinitely!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Janel McCauley

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it at Sephora (sorry Amazon) and was recommended for my red, dry skin. This stuff is amazing. It's smooth, faint scented, and got rid of my red chapped cheeks in 2 days. I'll definitely buy again....
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best heavy moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: My redness is gone, my face looks amazing. It doesn't cause any acne, it doesn't clog my pores, and my skin is the most even it's ever looked. Please note this is a thick cream, and it takes some patience and patting to work it into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: carrot wisdom

product_meta.title: Dr.Jart+ Cicapair Tiger Grass Cream_1.7oz by Dr. Jart
